channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 3 abandoned vehicles on Shelburne road, 23rd June
item.description:
Hi, There's 2 cars and 1 mini-van that have clearly never moved since pre-covid. So much so some tyres are flat, and the mud/leaves etc are surrounding them. Soon I think plants will be growing out of them! An Audi, a Japanese mini-van, and one more who's make I don't recall, but parked in between these two. If you go there on a weekend, or an evening... they're the 3 cars that never move!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 88 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor workmanship by City Fibre, 23rd June
item.description:
The work has left the pavements in a poor state in Benhall, and seem unlikely to last.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 47 Whittington Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven paving, 23rd June
item.description:
There is a paving slab that's about 2 inches higher than the rest, at the end of Bournside Rd, on the left when you turn onto hatherley road, by a tree (presumably tree root damage).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 52 Hatherley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass verge is overgrown, 23rd June
item.description:
The grass is so long on both sides of the entrance to the Cowley Road its impossible to see traffic when turning onto the A417
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Birdlip

item.title: Pedestrian crossing not working, 23rd June
item.description:
No lights showing on pedestrian crossing. WAIT sign working

item.title: Pothole, 23rd June

Two potholes

item.title: Road surface breaking up, 23rd June
item.description:
Large area of road surface in Glencairn Court breaking up. Needs re-surfacing. See also separate report of multiple potholes in same location, as just submitted.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Glencairn Park Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Muliple new potholes (and some old ones), 23rd June
item.description:
Many individual potholes in Glencairn Court - some of which are new, some are old and have been previously reported (but ignored). Last time, only one was repaired - ALL need to be done in one go this time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Glencairn Park Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More craters than the moon, 22nd June
item.description:
Road is now disintegrating, with terrible craters. Awful, awful condition.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 26 Irving House Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 22nd June
item.description:
Pothole

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Churchdown

item.title: Potholes cannot be missed!, 22nd June
item.description:
There are many potholes across the Sixways Junction on the London Road Charlton Kings and it is now impossible to miss them when negotiating the junction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1a Cudnall Street, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath is impassable, 21st June
item.description:
Hello, The hedge on this stretch of Lobleys Drive is now so overgrown that it is impossible to walk along it, and one must walk on the verge to get past. Can it be cut back please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Pippin Close, Abbeymead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in East end of Swindon Village Hall car park ., 21st June
item.description:
Pothole is steadily growing and is currently 110mm diameter and 50mm depth.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 28 Church Road, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in East end of Swindon Village Hall car park, 21st June
item.description:
This pothole measures 800mm diameter, 80mm depth with cracks extending to 2100mm diameter. Has been steadily growing for the last year or two.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Church Road, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Reddings Road, 21st June
item.description:
This road has straddle holes dug cutting across the road, from Grovefield way, right through to Hatherley Lane (i gather up to Unwin Road entrance as well.). With that, there are a number of potholes. This continues to blight Cars, buses, bicycles, and motorbikes, (even wheelchairs have obstructions crossing the road). It's worth bearing these later items to realise the danger, swerves, etc which may occur. This road has been in this state for years (maybe a decade) and needs attention.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Bramley The Reddings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sink hole, 19th June
item.description:
A sink hole has appeared on the corner of Mottershead Drive & Luke Lane. This is a very busy path as next to a school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 59 Mottershead Drive, Innsworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Railings bent restricting access, 19th June
item.description:
The railings have been hit by a vehicle and are now bent making it difficult to get round using a pram/cycle/wheelchair. The railings are at the side of parton Manor school down the small access road behind the library
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elm Close Parton Road, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath blocked from overgrowth, 19th June
item.description:
Plant growth has blocked the footpath. Pedestrians cannot walk on the pavement so no chance for a wheelchair or pram

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 85 Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extremely long grass, 19th June
item.description:
Please could you look to cut the grass on middle carriageway, so long it is difficult to see if car coming down road as you cross carriageway by 12 bells beefeater.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Ermin Way, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lack of white lines, 18th June
item.description:
On approaches to and on roundabout lack of white lines indicating lanes and arrows indicating which lane to be I. This causes problems for vehicles entering the roundabout not knowing whether vehicles on roundabout are leaving roundabout, or travelling around to next exit.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Northfield House Shurdington Road, Bentham
Report on FixMyStreet
